author: Special Correspondent
text:
Indian Railways’ Science Express will be stationed at Tirunelveli Junction for four days from March 13, Sunday.

According to Chelladurai, Manager, Tirunelveli Railway Junction, the Ministry of Railways is running the 8th phase of Science Exhibition, the exhibition train, in coordination with Department of Science and Technology and Ministry of Environment and Forest.

A treasure trove of knowledge for children and elders alike, the Science Express, would display details of climate change impact, nature conservation, recent advancements in biotechnology applications and international climate change negotiations etc.

The exhibition would be open from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m.

For more information on the train, one can visit http://www.sciencexpress.in/ or call 094284 05407 / 094284 05408 or send email to sciencexpress@gmail.com

Mr. Chelladurai said that the escalator erected at Tirunelveli junction at a cost of Rs. 2 crore would be inaugurated on March 15.
title: Science Express to arrive tomorrow
